titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of September 13, 2024, as "National Sepsis Day".
A resolution supporting the designation of September 13, 2024, as "National Sepsis Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of September 13, 2024, as National Sepsis Day.
